productdescription:

cheerful aura, and energetic surroundings. Your arrangements are transforming into memorable experiences as you greet

citydescription:
Adventure-filled Red Dunes Desert Safari with Quad Biking Tour
Take the Red Dunes Desert Safari with Quad Bike tour and explore the Arabian Lands in a fun and safe way. This trip lets
you enjoy the beautiful desert, and exciting activities, and learn about the local culture. You will ride over big red dunes
and see how people live in the desert. It's a mix of adventure, culture, and amazing views. You can also try camel riding,
taste traditional food, and visit a Bedouin-style camp. This adventure helps you experience the true culture of Dubai and is
perfect for anyone wanting to see life in the desert.
Start with Comfortable Transportation
Your adventure begins with a smooth pick-up from your hotel or a place you choose, so your desert trip starts without
any problems. You will travel in a comfortable, air-conditioned Jeep that keeps you safe and cozy during the ride. As you
leave the tall buildings of Dubai, you'll see big dunes and empty land ahead. The ride is not just to get to the place but
also your first look at the beautiful desert. The drivers know the area well, so the ride will be safe and smooth, making
you excited for the adventure. In the end, you'll be taken back to your hotel, making the whole experience easy.
producttitle: New Year EVE Burj Khalifa 2025/2026 Luxury Yacht Party With Live DJ & Dinner
productdescription:
Celebrate New Year's Eve in Unprecedented Luxury Aboard the Burj Khalifa 2025/2026 Luxury Yacht Party!|
Welcome to an extravagant New Year's Eve celebration like no other. Join us aboard our opulent luxury yacht for a night
of dazzling sophistication, exhilarating live DJ performances, and a gourmet dinner experience to remember. As we bid
farewell to the old year and usher in the new, revel in the perfect fusion of stunning skyline views and world-class
entertainment.
Prepare for the ultimate New Year's Eve experience, a soir√©e of pure extravagance and celebration, as we set sail on the
Burj Khalifa 2025/2026 Luxury Vacht. This exclusive event promises a night of opulence, featuring a live DJ, delectable
dinner, and breathtaking views of Dubai's iconic skyline.
Step into the epitome of extravagance and celebration as you embark on a remarkable journey aboard the Burj Khalifa
Luxury Yacht this New Year's Eve. This exclusive event is your passport to a night of unparalleled glamour, live
entertainment, gourmet dining, and awe-inspiring views.

citydescription:
Due to all the glitters and attraction, it isn't surprising that the Dubai Marina has become a popular destination for
tourists. For this reason, Dubai travel Tourism designed an outstanding package for a beautiful experience of Cruise in
Dubai. Surely, the biggest man made marina in the world has the best Marina cruise Dubai offers. Moreover, it is home to
the Yacht Dubai Marina club as well as the Jumeirah beach residence. Dubai Marina hotels certainly provide a great view of
the cruise in Dubai.
Our Dhow Cruise Dubai Marina tour begins with picking you up from your hotel or also from Dubai Marina hotels. When
you reach the Dubai Marina near yacht Dubai Marina club, you will see breathtaking views of the marina. We will board
you to the traditional vessel used to cruise down the routes of eastern Arabia. Then, you will have a lifetime experience on
the cruise while enjoying the beautiful sea and coastline views.
At the top of it, the night time cruise enhances the beauty of the journey and the mesmerizing view of glittering Dubai.
Certainly, this will be the best Marina Cruise Dubai Travel Tourism will offer you. Afterward, you will be served with a

producttitle: Burj Khalifa 2025/2026 Eve | Gold Fish Dubai Canal Cruise Lower Deck
productdescription:
If you are planning to spend this New Year 2025/2026 then go on Cruising in Dubai. Gold Fish Lower Deck is one of the
best and it even has accommodation which is for about 135 people. Out of which 75 for the upper deck and 60 for the
lower deck. The Lower deck boarding starts from 08:00 to 008:30 pm at the Jaddaf water fronts in the park located
behind the Versace Hotel. The departure begins at 9.30 PM and the cruise makes it way to the City Festivals and Burj
Khalifa. There, the guests will get to Witness the most majestic fireworks of all times. The Burj Khalifa Fireworks are
world famous and they are like cherry on top of the cake for New Vear Dubai 2025/2026 Eve. So, what are you waiting
for?
The cruise tour will be all about unlimited drinks and buffet dinner with multiple options but there will be no alcoholic
drinks as it will be a family cruising event. A number of entertaining shows like Tanoura and traditional events will keep
you entertained throughout the evening. For the kids to stay occupied, there will have puppet and horse shows. To make
things level up, the cruise will be decorated with ribbons and balloons. Go on this cruise dinner this New Year 2025/2026.

citydescription:
Al Hadeerah is in the perfect middle of the mesmerizing Lahbab Desert. It offers the ideal mix of opulence, ease, and
authentic luxury. Your VIP Desert Safari Dubai trip starts with an exciting dune bashing session. Our expert safari guides
will take you to steep red dunes, where you can explore the tricky trails and have an exhilarating ride. Utilize your VIP
Desert Safari trip to the fullest as you cross over tall red dunes and capture unforgettable moments with stunning desert
views. After you're done with dune bashing, you can do many fun things, like camel rides in the evening, quad biking,
taking a dune buggy, or sandboarding.
As the sun goes down, you can capture the most beautiful moments when the whole desert will be bathed in orange and
gold colours from every direction. The unrealistic and magical view of the sunset will give you the perfect chance to take
pictures that will make you remember your evening desert adventure for a long time.
producttitle: VIP Luxurious Desert Safari Dubai With 5 Star Gourmet Buffet At Bab
productdescription:
Dubai is known for its luxury and extravagance. It offers a wide range of tourist activities, and VIP Desert Safari Dubai
with 5 Star Gourmet Buffet at Bab al-Shams Al Hadeerah resort is one of the most interesting. We're excited to offer our
customers a VIP Desert Safari Dubai Package that will give them luxurious Gourmet dining in the desert and a fantastic
experience like never before! No matter which day you pick for your journey, you can be sure that our experienced staff
will do everything they can to ensure you have a fantastic red-carpet premium desert safari experience.
With our exciting deluxe desert experience, you can enjoy a memorable epitome of luxury and authentic Arabian culture.
Indulge yourself in exciting activities over the beautiful golden sands of the Arabian Desert and a delicious dinner at the
famous resort Bab al-Shams.
This 5-star Desert adventure starts with a comfortable and luxurious 4x4 SUV picking you up from your hotel or home in
comfort. You'll spend the whole day in unforgettable adventures and once-in-a-lifetime exposure! When you go on this
premium desert safari adventure around Dubai, you will be amazed by the stunning view of the tall red dunes that stretch
for miles in every direction. The 5-star resort Bab al-Shams will greet you with traditional Arabic hospitality and offer you
a variety of drinks and snacks, such as dates, Arabic gehwa, sweets, fresh juices, and more.

citydescription:
So, our VIP Desert Safari tour with a 5-star dinner at Bab al-Shams Al Hadeerah is a great way to
experience exciting
adventures, royal hospitality, and the authentic taste of delicious treats. It's a must-do activity for tourists who love
adventure and want to experience the luxury of Arabian culture. Book your spot now for a VIP tour through the desert
with us!
producttitle: Evening Desert Safari, Dune Bashing, Camel Riding, BBQ Dinner Buffet - Qual
productdescription:
One of the most interesting parts of our trip is fine dining at Bab al-Shams Al Hadeerah Resort, a beautiful example of
Arabian culture and luxury. It's in a great spot in the desert safari scenery, surrounded by red dunes, and it offers a VIP 5-
star buffet dinner to its most esteemed guests. You can choose from many Arabic and foreign dishes made with unique
ingredients by skilled chefs. At our gourmet buffet, there is something for everyone to enjoy, from juicy BBQ meals to
tasty desserts and foods that look good. As you enjoy a delicious dinner buffet under a sky full of stars, our performers
will perform live, including traditional belly dance and Tanura dance, which is both captivating and beautiful.
This mix of peaceful and quiet surroundings makes you feel like you are living in luxury and learning about other cultures.
After the dinner spread, add some tasty puffs of Hubbly bubbly sheesha to the night's fun while enjoying the peaceful
atmosphere. You can take a comfortable ride back to your home after your VIP desert safari trip in Dubai is over. You will
have had a lot of amazing and memorable experiences.

productdescription:
Adventure-filled Red Dunes Desert Safari with Quad Biking Tour
Take the Red Dunes Desert Safari with Quad Bike tour and explore the Arabian Lands in a fun and safe way. This trip lets
you enjoy the beautiful desert, and exciting activities, and learn about the local culture. You will ride over big red dunes
and see how people live in the desert. It's a mix of adventure, culture, and amazing views. You can also try camel riding,
taste traditional food, and visit a Bedouin-style camp. This adventure helps you experience the true culture of Dubai and is

citydescription:
Slide down the Dunes with Sand boarding
Another fun activity you can do in the desert is sandboarding. You ride a board and slide down the soft dunes. It's easy
for beginners and also fun for people with some experience. The desert is safe for everyone because the sand is soft and
won't hurt you. Some other activities in the desert include off-road jeep driving and sandboarding. Driving over the sand
hills with a view of the huge desert makes the trip even more exciting. It's something you should try to see the desert in a
new way.
producttitle: Dubai City Tour With Dhow Cruise Creek
productdescription:
Dune Bashing on the Red Sands
When you get to the desert, you will have the thrill of an exciting dune bashing on the huge red dunes. This is a thrilling
activity provided you have a professional driver who takes you in a car over the big steep dunes; it feels like a roller
coaster ride. They also have a special car that moves on the rough desert sand and offers you an experience you cannot
compare with. It drives up to the top of the tall red dunes then down and the ride is quite exhilarating. Doing this,
however, you get to view the vast red desert with sands stretching as far as one can sight. The yellow dune bashing or the
overall driving on the dune makes you feel alive and it's one of the top things to do on the trip.

producttitle: Desert Safari With Half Day Dubai City Tour
productdescription:
Watch Spectacular Live Performances
Both tourists and locals know that when the sun sets and turns the desert golden, the night's shows begin. These
performances are done by talented dancers and musicians to help you enjoy live Arabian music and dance. Belly dancers
move gracefully and smoothly, while the dancers with colorful twirling skirts put on an amazing show. There might also be
a fire show, with daring stunts and amazing tricks done with fire. Such shows as dances are perfect ways of giving an
amazing end to a day of exploration and discovery of the desert areas and culture.

Dhow Creek Cruise, a trading vehicle which turned into a complete package of entertainment for people. The sailing vessel
has long been used as a commercial vehicle in the past, but now it is known as Dubai Dhow Cruise.
Want to make your evening thrilling with it? Here we are at your service with our splendid Dhow Creek Cruise. With our
Dhow Creek Cruise, we deliver you a blend of diverse life experiences one can appreciate and relish. Upon lodging, you
will be received by welcoming staff that will delightedly cater you during your stay with us. You can adore the fascinating
night version of the city along the Cornish and capture precious flashes with your family and friends. With the service of
talented top-class chefs from around the world, Dhow cruise is the finest spot for food lovers. You can have a diverse
range of veg and non-veg mouthwatering menu on board. When on a honeymoon with your better half, we would leave no
stone unturned to make this a remarkable experience for you. Furthermore, there is a touch of live traditional belly dance
and Tanora dance to amaze you. We will provide you pick up from your hotel, followed by a drop off service at your door.

citydescription:
The Hot Air Balloon Tour in Dubai is the best! You will fly high over the beautiful Arabian Desert and enjoy amazing
views. It is not just a flight, but a special adventure that helps you feel the desert and enjoy being in the air. The tour
starts at 4:00 AM, with a pick-up, and takes you on a ride high in the sky. Every part of the trip is made to be
unforgettable; you get to see the desert from a higher place, which shows you the beauty of nature in a way you can't see
from the ground.
producttitle: Hot Air Balloon Tour Standard Flight
productdescription:
Ballooning is one of the most extraordinary experiences of a lifetime. As Dubai is one of the biggest world destinations
across the globe so it offers a wealth of cultural sites and scenic places. For one of the most extraordinary Hot Air Balloon
Adventure in Dubai where you can witness the scintillating skyscrapers of the city from the bird's eye view, Dubai travels
and tourism is at your service. We will ensure the magnificent panoramic sights along with the spectacular complimentary
pre-flight food soaring above everything else. Enjoy those once in your lifetime moments though Hot Air Balloon
Adventure where a magic carpet ride over the endless sand dunes and bright green oases. During the journey with an
English guide, you can spot Arabian wandering camels, Oryx and gazelles in their natural locale. Our journey of hot air
balloon usually takes off to comply with the sun as it rises over the Arabian Desert as these conditions are perfect for
flying considering the weather conditions. The serene ambiances of the incredible desert landscapes make it cooler. We
have also arranged for vour hotel pickups and vour stay at the hotel.

citydescription:
This tour starts with a morning pick-up from your hotel. You will see the beautiful sunrise and travel in a 4x4 car on
bumpy roads. It feels peaceful at the launch site with growing excitement. When you get to the launch site, the pilot will
welcome you and give additional information about the Mt. This is relevant as the pilot shall be cautioning you regarding
safety to prepare you for the experience. The pilot will show how the balloon inflates and works. If's fun to watch as the
balloon fills with air and slowly lifts into the blue sky.
producttitle: Hot Air Balloon Tour Dubai With Breakfast & Desert Safari tour

citydescription:
leisurely river trip of Juha's journey and the exciting Flood river will ensure that your delight. Moreover, our package also
consists of the exciting BurjSurj and Tantrum Alley water slides. Which will make you shout by their lengthy high-speed
downhill slides. After all, we care about your adventurous desires. Apart from that, we'll also facilitate the surfing lovers
with the ultimate experience of Riptide Flow-riders and wipe out rides. Enjoy their realistic wave effect and go nuts on
surfing. In addition to that, there is Jumeirah-Sceriah, a 33 meters free fall water slide which lets you overcome your water
fears and enjoy at best. In the end, enjoy our Wild Wadi Park package for a complete, comfortable trip including tickets
and hotel transfers.
productdescription:
Wild Wadi Water Park is present in one of the most visited attractions in Dubai. Dubai Travel Tourism can tailor a fun
filled adventurous day for you featuring the best rides in town. Located near Burj- ul- Arab, our tour to such delightful
park will provide you relaxing break from work. Wild Wadi Water Park is inspired by the legend of Juha and features
thirty amazing rides. We will make sure that you enjoy every ride and make your holiday the best one in your lists, The
leisurely river trip of Juha's journey and the exciting Flood river will ensure that your delight. Moreover, our package also
consists of the exciting BurjSurj and Tantrum Alley water slides. Which will make you shout by their lengthy high-speed
downhill slides. After all, we care about your adventurous desires. Apart from that, we'll also facilitate the surfing lovers
